title: Kidnapped; Catriona
brief_description: A dramatisation of Robert Louis Stevenson’s well known tale that has captured the imagination of generations of readers. When young David Balfour meets runaway Jacobite rebel, Alan Breck, a survivor of the Battle of Culloden a series of exciting adventures ensue in the bleak Scottish landscape. This video also features the lesser known sequel “Catriona”. Starring Michael Caine and Jack Hawkins.
